{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07817v1", "title": "Search for the baryon and lepton number violating decay $J/ψ\to pe^-$
  + c.c", "summary": "Based on $(2712.4\pm 14.3) \times 10^{6} $ ${\psi(3686)}$ events collected by
the BESIII detector operating at the BEPCII storage ring, we perform a search
for the baryon- and lepton-number violating decay $J/\psi \to pe^{-}+c.c.$ via
$\psi(3686) \to \pi^{+}\pi^{-}J/\psi$. No significant signal is found. An upper
limit on the branching fraction of $\mathcal{B}(J/\psi \to p e^{-}+ c.c.) < 3.1
\times 10^{-8}$ at 90\% confidence level.", "main_category": "hep-ex", "categories": "hep-ex", "published": "2025-04-10T14:54:57Z"}
